alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued February 03 at 2:27AM PST until February 03 at 9:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST FRIDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 28 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 50 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, until noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
